box: The IT@School, a project under the Directorate of Public Instruction of the government of Kerala, India enables FOSS led digital literacy. This project integrates ICT as part of the teaching and learning for improvement of conventional teaching and learning systems.
Spoken Tutorial, an educational content portal that teaches students FOSS
The programm on Free/Libre and Open Source Software Education (FOSSEE), which works with communities while organizing conferences and forums
